name: Space Debris
description:
A Local Co-op Zen Space Rock Demolition game.

It began with a dream of two young boys.
Demolishing space rocks to collect space dust...
...made so much better together.
Currently a dozen different ships with unique abilities.
Drop in/out Local Multiplayer.
Up to 16 Player Couch Co-op. (4 Xinput + 8 Dinput + 4 Keyboard)
Playing solo? Add an AI ship to help!

Blast rocks. Don't get crushed.

A family-made game by a mom and her two sons.
